verbs.description: Good for you , kids . [ARG0: I] [V: guess] [ARG1: our generation just ca n't get it right . Penelope Spurr 's May 20 letter , " Eight common sense gun laws , " was right on . Maybe not all of those can be implemented] , but even three of them would be good . I taught high school for 30 years , and our biggest fear was that someone would bring in a squirt gun on a sunny day . Times have changed , for sure . President Donald Trump 's idea of guns for teachers is nothing more than asinine , and all of my colleagues agree . To all of you kids and young adults : Get involved , vote and run for office . We need to change this . Marilyn Bramwell , Northwest Portland

President Donald Trump 's idea of guns for teachers is nothing more than asinine , and all of my colleagues agree . To all of you kids and young adults : Get involved , vote and run for office . We need to change this . Marilyn Bramwell , Northwest Portland
